storyInfo: Saria faces off against Ho'olheyak while the army assaults the lab. The past sweeps over Rosmontis like a tide.

attributes.content: The flowers... they're so beautiful.
Have you come to see me again? I don't know today's flowers. Can you teach me how to spell them?
Of course, Narcissa. What do you want to do after you learn it?
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: I want to put these petals in my picture book, just like I used to.
Mom loved flowers. Dad knew a lot about plants, just like you.
They're not around any more, but I want to record these new flowers, and tell them about them when I visit their graves.
You'll bring me there, right? It's almost April.
Narcissa, my child, you're always the strong one.
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: Leave the flowers on the table. I'll teach you writing once I'm done with my work.
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: It smells good. What's for dinner?
Why did you come over here?
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: Sit down over there. We're having your favorite potato soup.
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: I'm hungry. Can you cut quicker?
Do you want to help out? No need to be scared, I'll hold your hand.
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: Like... like this?
Well done. You'll do even better in the future.
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: The future? Will I grow up to be as tall and strong like you? Become a great scientist?
No, you'll be greater than I am. Much greater.
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: Does the wound on the back of your head still hurt?
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: Not anymore.
My brothers gave me lots of sweets. They say that one sweet before going to bed helps with the pain, and makes me dream of cotton candy.
Good girl.
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: You can have them once you've had dinner. Then there's a place I want to take you to.
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: Over at the corridor?
The place my brothers went yesterday?
They said there's a nice garden there, just like those in the storybooks, and that's the place you get your flowers.
Yes.
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: Those who pass through its doors are blessed by fate.
attributes.name: Familiar Silhouette

attributes.content: At the end of the corridor is...

attributes.text: I can't get the door open! Any ideas, Muelsyse? We need to go!

attributes.content: Rosmontis.
Who is Rosmontis?
Who is Narcissa?
Welcome.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: You're waiting for me?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Always have been.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Where are the Doctor? Where are the others?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Where they were. This court does not need an audience.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Court?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Is this a court? Who's on trial?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I, Loken Williams.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I am both accused and accuser.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: In these last moments, before fate devours me—
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I implore you to witness my life.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Here and now, I confess to all my crimes.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Greed.
attributes.name: 'Loken'

attributes.content: Yes. My teacher reproached me.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: He chided me for my recklessness, and admonished my extraction of infected organs from the dying as being both illegal and immoral.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: He said my actions did not help patients, only accelerated their deaths.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: They were already dying; their consciousness had already passed over to the other side. I did not intend to cause any more pain, nor did I change their fate.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: But my teacher did not agree. He and his teacher pronounced my death sentence in academia, in a private trial with no justice to speak of.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: They refused to admit that greed is a virtue for a scientist.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: A small-town boy's biology education is limited to delivering burdenbeast calves, unless he musters the courage to dissect the newborn calf in the middle of the night.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: The thirst for knowledge was enough to overcome his empathy. He needed to seize every opportunity to climb, to continue on the path of exploration.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Cowardice.
attributes.name: 'Loken'

attributes.content: I have not often been found wanting of courage, but there was one thing that I yielded to.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Maylander banned me after my teacher reported me, a mark of shame that shut me out of all universities and government-sponsored research institutions.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: It was the cruelest punishment you could inflict on a scientist in his prime. They stripped me of my right to research. It was akin to murder of the soul.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I began drowning myself in drink. For a year and ten months, I forced myself to face my trembling hands, so that I could forget the pain of not being able to hold a scalpel.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: That was when they found me.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: They. The shameless rascals.
attributes.name: 'Loken'

attributes.content: The Department of Defense. They funded Loken Watertank. In return, I was to develop the most powerful weapon for them in five years.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Science is neutral, pure, and free. Practical value, especially in terms of weaponization, can only be a burden for science.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I did not want to contribute my research for them, but they knew what my weakness was.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Knowledge is expensive. Instruments, equipment, materials, down to the bricks that make up the laboratory—it all takes money.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Building the lab of my dreams costs more than building a skyscraper in the middle of Trimounts.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I had to admit my weakness and prostrate myself before their power.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: How pathetic.
attributes.name: 'Loken'

attributes.content: Is this nation any less so? They have allowed barbaric power to control the lifeline of science!
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: There is no one more short-sighted than the soldier. They are at the helm of science, yet they know not how to use such precious knowledge except to kill their own kind.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Folly.
attributes.name: 'Loken'

attributes.content: Yes, folly. The most unforgiveable crime that a scientist can commit.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: The foolish soldiers are easy to deceive. Getting subcutaneous Arts units, the result of billions in investment, was enough to satisfy them.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: But I was too busy, too obsessed with my research, to realize the weakness and ambition of those around me.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: A foolish student of mine handed part of my experiment data to the Department of Defense.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: They learned what Loken Watertank was really researching, and were eager to see results, even threatening to take direct control.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: How could I allow them to steal my dream, when I was so close to finishing my masterpiece?!
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: You took a risk. You failed.
attributes.name: 'Loken'

attributes.content: You lost everything.
attributes.name: 'Loken'

attributes.content: Narcissa destroyed your lab. That wasn't so bad, but then Maylander came again. They took Narcissa, robbed you of your dream again.
attributes.name: 'Loken'

attributes.content: You were like a walking corpse. The Department of Defense confiscated the scraps, then wanted you to repay the billions of investment. You could not repay it, and you refused to work with them anymore.
attributes.name: 'Loken'

attributes.content: So you were thrown into prison, like a piece of rotting meat that no one paid any further attention too.
attributes.name: 'Loken'

attributes.content: That was my greatest crime—failure!
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Now, my final and greatest failure stands before me.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Narcissa!
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: The only flower in my garden that has not been trampled into the mud. Broken, but still beautiful.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Look at me. Look at the Loken Williams who raised you, educated you, oppressed you, tormented you.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: You witnessed me, inches away from the summit, and witnessed my fall from grace into the abyss.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Now I invite you, child, to be the stick that measures my pain, my regrets, my crimes.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: You are the only one fit to do so.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Push forward!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Area suppressed!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Gamma and Delta?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: No more reinforcing power armors!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Excellent. Continue the attack and prepare to breach the building.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Argh—!
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Not so fast.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Colonel!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Should I start with you?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Will killing you buy more time?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You... traitor!
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Traitor? We have always been enemies. Who have I betrayed?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Argh—*cough*—
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: How fragile.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Should I have done this a long time ago? You almost killed our beloved Vice President. Maybe I can exchange your head for a pardon.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: All units...
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Attack...!
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: You want to be a martyr.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Perhaps I should oblige.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Oh, there you are, hero.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: The military and Maylander have this building surrounded. You can't win.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Win?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: It's not victory that I'm looking for. It's a chance.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Same for Kristen.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: No chance is worth so many lives, including your own.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You think so?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Compared to my knowledge, my own life has always been insignificant.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I've seen so much history, but to time, I'm hardly even a passing breeze.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: That's my life. My poor, boring life.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: A tiny little bit of time, for the chance to touch eternal knowledge, even for an instant—how can it not be worth it?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You're even fascinated by death.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Don't get me wrong. I'm just... curious.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I know thousands of ways to die, over hundreds, thousands of years of history. But I only get to die once.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Period. Full-stop, standing between accumulated memories, and the possibilities of the future. How does it feel?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You'll find out.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.text: There was no enamel blade growth.\nSaria simply focused all her strength on her hand.
There was no Originium Arts involved.\nThat is why the fist was able to penetrate the distorted air.

attributes.content: Oh dear, looks like I've lost.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I guess that's it, Saria. Kill me here, and make it quick. Or maybe not so quick. I should savor the moment. I only get one chance, after all.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You... madwoman.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: What about you? Did you think yourself a creature of reason in all that you do?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You wanted to prevent disaster in the most efficient manner. You're standing at the door. Why don't you work with the military?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: They tend to make things worse.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: What about Maylander?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: They have been your firm allies for the past five years. They made the decision to work with the military.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Oh, and the adorable little Liberi.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: The little brown bird, so full of morality and empathy. I saw her in one of the military aircraft.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I didn't know you had that expression in you.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Your hands are growing weaker. Everything is going out of control, even your own heart. Is that not a strange feeling to a woman like you?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Your taunts are meaningless.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Poor Saria. That's not what your eyes, your hands, every inch of your body is saying.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Are you sure you don't want to run over to the lab there right this instant?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: It may already be too late.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: In an instant, Ho'olheyak is standing on top of a half-collapsed wall.
A few more leaps, and she is gone from the battlefield.
The door to the lab is broken... how could it be?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Loken...!
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Well, time is almost up anyway.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Might as well call it a day.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You're Loken.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You came to the orphanage every Friday evening.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You brought different flowers each time.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Your clothes always had a strong smell to them. The smell of swimming pools and freshly painted fences.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I didn't really mind that smell. I wanted to tell you that you didn't need to hide it with flowers.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But I didn't say anything because I liked your flowers. I liked the stories of plants that you told. It reminded me of Dad.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Good, good! Your memories are coming back!
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Yes, I'm remembering.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You used to be very nice to me. Then you became very mean.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I'm sorry, child, I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I promised you... I wanted to give you a happy future.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: You and your brothers should have been the perfect lifeforms.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: You would have redefined Originium Arts, freed yourselves from the shackles of talent, the plague of Oripathy.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Yes, you... no, we should have conquered fate itself together.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Why? Why couldn't I do it? I ruined us both!
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Why are you crying?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Tears falling on the hand. Salty. Painful.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I have seen you cry before.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: That day... no, I don't want to remember.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I don't want you in my memories. It's painful to forget, but even more painful to remember you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Don't forget.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Remember me. Please, remember me. Remember the criminal.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Filled with guilt.
Filled with pain.
No... no...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: My brothers...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Why... why? Why! My memories are coming back... my head hurts... it's cold!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Grab me.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Grab my neck. Clutch it in your hands. Do you feel the pulsating veins? The blood is warm. You won't be cold anymore.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Blood... how could it be warm?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It's colder than ice, more suffocating than water.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It's you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It's all you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You took my life and my brothers away.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You turned me into... into...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: A monster.
A weapon.
A destroyer.
Then kill me. Destroy my broken body. Crush my guilty soul. For all that you've lost.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Kill you...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Will all the crimes disappear if I kill you?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The lives that people should have lived won't be taken away again? They can be with the ones they love?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...I can't lie to you anymore.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: But at least I deserve it.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Time is short. We'll have company soon.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I'll go to them.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I won't let anyone... stand in the way of what's right.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Doctor, the army men are coming!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: We need to go deeper! Hurry!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Old Loken's locked the door! This building is like a maze. It's got Nasti's handprints all over it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: We've been at it for a while now, but we still have no clue where they are.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm concerned about the kitten... but I doubt an old, sickly scientist like Loken could do anything to her.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: He wants to retrieve Rosmontis's memories.;He wants to incite Rosmontis's anger.

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Did he finally go off the deep end? They say being in prison too long makes you go crazy.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But... well, I'm not sure I should say it, but the kitten has a reason to be angry after Loken did all that to her, doesn't she?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I was angry when I saw Iffy's experiment logs, angry enough that I wanted to flood those ruins six feet deep.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Loken would be getting what he deserved. Assuming, just assuming, that Rosmontis really had vengeance on her mind... I'm not sure I'm really in a position to stop her...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I just don't want Loken to get what he wants.;I just want Rosmontis to do what she wants.
I want to be with my family.;I want to help my operator.

attributes.name: Muelsyse
attributes.content: Then we'd better hurry...

attributes.name: Muelsyse
attributes.content: Eek—!
Th-That was close...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: We almost got roasted together!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Army power armors! Get inside!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Doctor, we have to—
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Over here!
Am I starting to hear things? Why do I feel like I just heard Iffy's voice?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Come with me!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: What's wrong with you? Step on it! You FNG or something?
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Y-YOU'RE the FNG!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator?

attributes.content: It's sounding more and more like...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Target, 3 o'clock!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Nngh?!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: So that's how it works? It's so complicated... I'd rather use my fire...
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator?

attributes.content: The power armor convulses a few times before you.
Then, a fiery red girl leaps out in a shower of sparks.
Doctor? MuMu? You're both here!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: You can drive a mech?;Isn't this thing supposed to be a nightmare to drive?

attributes.content: It's a piece of cake for a genius like me!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Alright, well, Saria modified it, so she's the genius. Ask her the details. She's close.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Saria's here too?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If only she would let me do stuff myself. But why don't you look happy, MuMu?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It's not that...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Wait, that's the way Rosmontis went... the power armor went there?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Go, go, go!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Hostile conta—er, it's a young girl. Sensors indicate the presence of an elderly male further in.
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Should we proc—wait!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Giant floating weapons!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: High-threat target identified! Attack!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: You're... a soldier.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Cold outer shell... no warmth, no emotion.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Are you fighting bad people? Do you stand with the people who have been hurt?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Possible unidentified high-threat test subject!
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator
Power Armor Operator
attributes.content: Requesting permission to engage—

attributes.name: Power Armor Operator
attributes.content: Gah!
No, you don't have your own will.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You don't think about right and wrong before you act, do you?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Then, you're just a puppet on strings.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Go away, or I'll destroy you too.
attributes.name: Rosmontis
